page.description: The TF directive precedes a time or date format. When you have multiple directives in a format string, you separate them with semi-colons ";".

argument.name: Format_String
argument.description: Character. A date or time format as Defined by Date Format Codes and Time Format Codes.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following script displays a dialog with the current date and time.
section.example: dim t as T t = now() ui_dlg_box(""," [%TF=M/d/y%.20t] [%TF=h:mm:0s am%.20t]")
